insert into member_notice (m_id, message, msg_type, is_read, add_time, update_time, last_excu_time) values
( #{list.mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{list.message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.msgType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{list.isRead,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{list.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{list.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{list.lastExcuTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select:
select
from member_notice where msg_type = #{msgType} and is_read = 0 ORDER BY last_excu_time asc
